programme.title: Ready Jet Go! - EP 59
programme.desc: Ready Jet Go! follows two neighborhood kids: Sean, who has an all-consuming drive for science facts, and Sydney, who has a passion for science fiction and imagination. They both befriend the new kid on their street, Jet Propulsion, whose family members happen to be aliens! Together, they embark on great adventures, exploring the solar system, learning about space and science, but always back just in time for dinner!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5 - EP 20
programme.desc: Mr. Dragon is offering free rides to children today! He just has one simple rule. However, this rule throws the children's plans for fun into a mess! Can they figure out how to get along and enjoy the ride? Mr. Astronaut trains the children to be Junior Astronauts. Their training is put to the test when something goes wrong with the spaceship.

programme.title: Welcome To The Wayne S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Ansi Molina moves into the Wayne, an apartment building filled with strange and unusual things labeled as "Wayne Phenomena". He befriends siblings Olly and Saraline Timbers as they learn the mysteries of the Wayne and protect the outside world while contending with a spy cell seeking to exploit apartment's supernatural aspects for their own nefarious ends.

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S8 - EP 1
programme.desc: In the new Season 8, exciting new creatures join the Mane 6 Twilight Sparkle, Rarity, Applejack, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy , including Silverstream the Hippogriff-Seapony, Smolder the Dragon and Yona the Yak, as they go on new epic adventures throughout new and familiar lands such as Mount Aris, Everfree Forest, Las Pegasus and more!

programme.title: Pokemon the Series: Sun Moon - Ultra Legends S22 - EP 43
programme.desc: This season follows the final adventures of Ash Ketchum and his classmates at the Pokemon school in the Alola region.

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher - EP 3
programme.desc: When Iz sees a poster for a local wrestling House Show, he's determined to go. With Sanjay and Bonemasher's help they conjure up ways to convince Sharon that Iz deserves to go. Unfortunately, someone else has the bright idea about attending.

programme.title: Future Card Buddyfight Ace - EP 32
programme.desc: The anime's story takes place 23 years after the events of Future Card Buddyfight X and centres on Yuga Mikado, son of Gao Mikado. Because Yuga is talented at games, he is known as the "Ace of Games." However, Buddyfight is Yuga's first card game. Yuga's buddy is Gargantua Dragon, a.k.a. Garga.

programme.title: Word Whiz or Slime Pit? S3 - EP 7
programme.desc: Watch out kids! Dr. Slime is back and he needs more minions! In each episode, 3 contestants battle it out to escape his slime lab and become the word whiz. But it will not be easy because Dr. Slime has come up with all new slime rules!

programme.title: Destination Flavour Singapore - EP 3
programme.desc: Destination Flavour Singapore sees Adam Liaw exploring Singapore's culinary melting pot by talking and cooking with home cooks and prominent chefs. Visiting speciality hawker stalls that have been handed down through generations to some of the finest 5-star restaurants on the planet, Adam gathers inspirations for cooking a five course Singapore banquet meal.

programme.title: We Are Singaporeans S5 - EP 7

Celebrities Alan Wan and Eswari bravely agree to be contestants - can they win $10,000 for the charity of their choice?

programme.title: The World's Best - EP 2

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S5 - Possession - EP 5

This relic has the power to open the fabric between realms, enabling the powerful Preeminent to enter the NINJAGO world!

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 80
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Exlosers - EP 3

programme.desc: This series pits teams of current and classic TV stars from multiple eras and different genres against one another in a variety of athletic games, like Tug of War, Archery, Kayak Relay, Obstacle Course, and Dunk Tank.

programme.title: Grizzy The Lemmings S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a magician's hat that tosses out objects stored inside beforehand with the tap of a magic wand. He decides to impress his beloved she-bear with a magician's act. But he will have to work around the Lemmings, who have the gift of coming out of the hat at the wrong moment.

programme.title: Grizzy The Lemmings S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: A magic tomahawk divides Grizzy into two identical bears with diametrically opposite personalities: one short-tempered, the other super-sweet. The Lemmings, who did not witness Grizzy's split, will have a hard time working out the behavior of their usual enemy, who seems to swing from excessive kindness to the worst trickery for no reason.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Paddington Bear S1 To S3 - EP 20
programme.desc: The classic adventures of Paddington Bear.

programme.title: Chuggington S6 - EP 3
programme.desc: Wilson is excited about being the new voice of Radio Chuggington, but when the chuggers decide to see a movie over listening to his radio stories, he exaggerates a news story that sets the town in panic!

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 14
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: My Star Bride - EP 15
programme.desc: R Wen Hua seizes the opportunity and slips away. Shi Jie and Fang Cao decide to find Ouyang Long to inquire about Wen Hua. When Ouyang Long hears that Wen Hua is suspected to be involved in child trafficking from Vietnam to Singapore, it shocks him. He dissociates himself from Wen Hua immediately, claiming not to have his contact. It turns out that the girl Wen Hua has abducted then is Shan Shan.

programme.title: Morning Express - EP 234
programme.desc: Live A daily brand new News belt, from Monday to Friday, 9am - 9.30am.

programme.title: Recipe Of Life - EP 79
programme.desc: R Ruo Wei slips away from the surveillance of the private investigator to a teahouse to meet Nan Hua. They discuss how to deal with Hui Ying. Nan Hua wants Ruo Wei to maintain the status quo and at the same time, find Jin Long's whereabouts. Hui Ying suddenly arrives at the teahouse to do a spot check. Thankfully, her driver informs Ruo Wei and he leaves in advance without Hui Ying discovering him.

programme.title: Mr Mrs Kok - EP 6
programme.desc: R "Mr Mrs Kok" is a brand new half-hour dramedy series exploring the explosive and highly entertaining impact of a couple in their 40s going through their mid-life crisis while balancing their passion for crime busting and bad guy beating.

programme.title: Lee's Family Reunion - EP 598
programme.desc: R By chance, Yongzhen sees Minmin accompanying Letian on the streets. She teams up with Tiancheng to rush to the hospital to check Letian's whereabouts. Unexpectedly, Letian has returned to the ward in time to cover up.

programme.title: Lee's Family Reunion - EP 599
programme.desc: R In order to test Xiaozu's true feelings, Ailin fakes suicide. However, Xiaozu still insists on leaving her. Meanwhile, Jianan is overjoyed when he learns that Minmin is pregnant with his child.

programme.title: Deals For Joy - EP 30
programme.desc: This gingko extract promotes blood circulation for good health!

programme.title: Deals For Joy - EP 60
programme.desc: Multi-functional kettle suitable for different stewing needs!

programme.title: News 8 at One - EP 234
programme.desc: Weekday afternoon updates on local and world news headlines.

programme.title: Peace Prosperity - EP 62
programme.desc: R Yuan Hao is ill, leaving Shu Zhi to manage the fruits stall alone. She is unable to cope and was almost cheated by a customer. Cui Hua offers to help her. However, Shu Zhi is suspicious of Cui Hua's intentions after finding out that the latter is Ping An's niece. Zi Hao is coming down from the house and upon spotting Cui Hua, he pulls a prank on her. When Cui Hua sees him, it was love at first sight for her.

programme.title: Stoneage: The Legendary Pet S1 - EP 49
programme.desc: R A passionate dreamer Woody, along with a baby pet dinosaur Moga, sets path to become the best pet trainer. Join Woody's journey as the action and comedy will keep your futuristic stone-age era a worthwhile adventure!

programme.title: Secrets Of Xian - EP 1
programme.desc: R The documentary "The Secrets of Xian" pursues the historical origin of "freshness" from a new angle and use scientific experiment methods to uncover the secrets behind 'freshness'. The story excavates the cultural connotation behind the food, and tells the audience about the mystery of "fresh" with delicious dishes and new, strange and special stories.

programme.title: Deals For Joy - EP 3
programme.desc: Discover how you can wake up every morning glowing and refreshed as our hosts prove how a comfortable pillow is key for a good night's sleep.

programme.title: Deals For Joy - EP 51
programme.desc: A training fitness device that efficiently trains lower-body muscles, helps to improve walking ability!

programme.title: Nothing Gold Can Stay - EP 26
programme.desc: R Taking the advice from Zhou Ying, Shen Xingyi secretly added in some plant leaves as an agent to stop bleeding from fresh wounds while preparing the plasters ordered by the army. As it turns out, this helps to avert a catastrophe for his family when the Imperial Officials arrive to spot check on the effectiveness of the plasters.

programme.title: Taste Of Life - EP 586
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change.

programme.title: Loving You - EP 16
programme.desc: R Steve is being chased by creditors; he pursues Lin Li more actively than before as a last resort. Lin Li rejects Steve, admitting that she does not have any romantic feelings towards him. Steve is outraged and suddenly asks Lin Li to pay him back for his wasted effort and time. Dong Sheng rushes to the scene and throws a punch at Steve!

programme.title: Hello Singapore - EP 234
programme.desc: Live Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8.

programme.title: Recipe Of Life - EP 80
programme.desc: Min Ming's pregnancy news spreads online. Upon learning this, Ruo Feng goes through the trouble to go to Min Ming's school. In an attempt to help her resolve this crisis, he proposes to her in public. However, Min Ming states that she does not need his help. Ruo Feng then confesses his feelings to her and expresses that he does not mind raising the child together with her.

programme.title: Old Taste Detective S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Local oyster omelette is mainly divided into Teochew Hokkien style. It is said the original version of Teochew oyster omelette, orh suan, is a very starchy dish. Kym Chef Devid visit local traditional eateries to collate all information so as to recreate the old taste of Teochew oyster omelette.

programme.title: My Star Bride - EP 16
programme.desc: Ouyang Long mistakes that Shi Jie and Fang Cao has come to talk about Shan Shan's matter and chases them away cruelly. His actions frighten Li Yin so she goes to her room to rest. He reveals to Shan Shan that Fang Cao is her elder sister, who has travelled from Vietnam to find her, shocking Shan Shan. He states that they must never let Li Yin find out that she is adopted but Li Yin overhears them.

programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news.

programme.title: The Little Nonya - EP 33
programme.desc: Yuzhu appears to be calm but is secretly harbouring thoughts of suicide upon knowing that she will be marrying Robert Zhang the next day. Ah Tao and Tianlan worry about Yuzhu, and hence take turns to look after her. Tianlan stumbles upon Jincheng's affair with Xiujuan. In a panic, she falls to her death.

programme.title: Recipe Of Life - EP 83
programme.desc: On Si Yu's and Chao Wei's big day, Yvette uses her father's mobile phone and discovers a video unintentionally. In the video, Ruo Feng tells Min Ming that he is willing to be the father of her child, shocking everyone who is present. Upon knowing that Min Ming is pregnant with his child, Chao Wei dashes out of the door, leaving Si Yu behind.

programme.title: My Star Bride - EP 19
programme.desc: Fang Cao witnesses Li Yin's condition relapsing and how she scolds Shan Shan for not being her biological daughter and attacks her. Fang Cao is in shock and is guilty as she thinks that this is the cause of her persistence in wanting to acknowledge her sister. She decides to let Shan Shan go, not forcing her to return to Vietnam and feels that Shan Shan living a blissful life is enough for her.

programme.title: News Tonight With Highlights From Parliament - EP 26

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7 - EP 5
programme.desc: The old theatre is about to be torn down and Cherry is distraught. She tries to put up a show to remind everyone of the magic of the theatre, but will she get it together in time? Monster Cactus is lonely and wants a pet, just like all the other people in Ollipolis. Unfortunately, his spines are too sharp and scare off many potential pets. To make matters worse, he's already decided on the pet that he wants: the Shifty Squares' balloon dog.

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom - EP 21
programme.desc: True accidentally hurts Cumulo's feelings, and now he's gone missing! To make matters worse, the boatyfloat' flies off with Mila and Rocky on board!

programme.title: Super Wings S3: Part 3 Mission Teams - EP 1
programme.desc: Fun-loving jet plane Jett delivers packages to children around the world in this animated series. Jett teams up with the Super Wings, a group of airplanes that can transform into robots, to tackle new challenges and work through issues that teach problem-solving skills and cultural diversity.

programme.title: Chuggington S6 - EP 9
programme.desc: When new chugger, Rosa, comes to Chuggington, the trainees try to help her find a job that she will love in her new city.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7 - EP 5
programme.desc: The old theatre is about to be torn down and Cherry is distraught. She tries to put up a show to remind everyone of the magic of the theatre, but will she get it together in time? Monster Cactus is lonely and wants a pet, just like all the other people in Ollipolis. Unfortunately, his spines are too sharp and scare off many potential pets. To make matters worse, he's already decided on the pet that he wants: the Shifty Squares' balloon dog.

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 17
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Becca's Bunch - EP 9
programme.desc: In Wagtail Woods one little bird, Becca, and her Bunch of friends, are ever ready for adventure. Becca, a happy bobble hat wearing bird sees adventure in every situation and as a result often bites off more than she can chew; landing herself and her Bunch - Russell, Sylvia and Pedro - in some sticky situations. But it's in the midst of these 'oops' moments that Becca's unique ideas, heart, positive-thinking and leadership skills really shine.

programme.title: Clangers S2 S3 - EP 19
programme.desc: Big Hoot and Little Hoot come to visit the Clangers. Tiny has written a new tune. But will Big Hoot come and play it with her, or is he too busy with the other Clangers?

programme.title: Martha Bakes S7 - EP 10
programme.desc: Martha shares her best tips and techniques with viewers, giving them the confidence to create the finest desserts and delectable baked goods in their own kitchens. From Martha's favourite breakfast recipes to puddings and cookies, Martha's updated versions of the classics will set the standard.

programme.title: Tropical Gourmet With Justine Scofield - New Caledonia - EP 5
programme.desc: Star of Australia's most watched cooking series everyday gourmet, Justine Schofield heads to the magical island of new Caledonia to explore its gastronomic wonders, tropical beaches and breathtaking natural beauty. Along the way she will also take time out to cook up a delicious variety of dishes inspired by the local, tropical and French influences that make New Caledonia such a special place.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S38 - EP 7255
programme.desc: Encore This gameshow features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Kin - EP 588
programme.desc: Zara discovers that Louis had deceived both Madeline and her. Matthew finally gets Yang to open up. Syirah is concerned about Rosnani getting too close to Harris.

programme.title: Tanglin - EP 14
programme.desc: Bhaskar offers to deliver Li Yan's medical results to her after Li Yan shares her anxiety. But while relaying Li Yan's medical results, Bhaskar makes a misjudged gesture that suggests his romantic feelings for her, resulting in Li Yan backing off.

programme.title: Talking Point - EP 40
programme.desc: Encore What's it like surviving COVID-19? From long-term health implications, to dealing with crushing stigma, and finding new meaning in life, hear stories from survivors, through their eyes.

programme.title: Grizzy The Lemmings S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy The Lemmings S2 - EP 25
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the ranger's mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Polly Pocket S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: When Polly is finally allowed to babysit little Pax, she finds out that it's not such an easy job after all. Believing the only thing that makes him happy is his favourite teddy bear, Polly takes Pax and her friends on a crazy quest to recover it!

programme.title: Time Traveler Luke - EP 9
programme.desc: Luke repeats his time travels in attempt to save Mia from her destiny. But things never go right and Luke just makes things worse, with the Statue of the Faun ending up in Indiana's hand.

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug Cat Noir S2 - EP 25
programme.desc: Marinette tries to find ways to get closer to Adrien, but Ladybug and Cat Noir have their hands full with the akumatizing havoc wreaked by Hawk Moth!

programme.title: Mega Man: Fully Charged S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Aki gets cast as Mega Man in the school play--- written directed by his crush, Ashley Adderley--- only to have a newly supercharged Elec Man crash the show on opening night! Aki and Suna take a rehabilitated Ice Man out for a day in the city, but things take a turn for the worst when Sgt. Night plants a device on Ice Man that corrupts his programming.

programme.title: Busy Bodies - EP 8
programme.desc: Itch Itch Itchy! Aidan and Evie get bitten by bugs, and they're suffering in agony! Med tries his best to be helpful...well, kind of. Plus - ever wondered why our skin turns purple after we bump into objects? Accident prone Aidan finds out the hard way after crashing indoors. With Bruce the bruise on his head, it's up to Med and Evie to find out the strange workings of how our skin does more than just look good...

programme.title: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader? 2019 - EP 8
programme.desc: The hit game show where adults have to answer grade-school level questions to win big is back! And this time, the kids play a bigger role as they help contestants prove that they are smarter than a 5th grader. Hosted by John Cena.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 12
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

programme.title: Kin - EP 589
programme.desc: Zaryf is amused by Syirah's intense dislike of Harris. Tension grows between Nathan and Nina and Nathan is disappointed when Kenneth takes Nina's side.

programme.title: News Tonight With Highlights From Parliament - EP 27
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - How To Stop A Pandemic - EP 38
programme.desc: From spycams and breathalysers to light technology that kills microbes. Ching Shu Yi meets Singapore's 20-something innovators who think they have the solutions to tackle the next big pandemic.

programme.title: ONE Championship - EP 20
programme.desc: Live ONE Championship is a celebration of true martial arts and its deep-rooted Asian values of humility, integrity, respect, honor, kindness, discipline, courage, and strength. Martial arts has been Asia's greatest cultural treasure for the last 5,000 years, and is a part of the daily fabric of society across the continent. Asia is home to the best martial artists on the planet. Our mission is to unleash real life superheroes who ignite Asia with hope, dreams, inspiration and strength.

programme.title: 12 Feet Deep
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, two sisters are trapped under the fiberglass cover of an Olympic sized public pool and must brave the cold and each other to survive the harrowing night.

programme.title: Kin - EP 589
programme.desc: Zaryf is amused by Syirah's intense dislike of Harris. Tension grows between Nathan and Nina and Nathan is disappointed when Kenneth takes Nina's side.

programme.title: Ninja Warrior - EP 1
programme.desc: Sasuke is a Japanese sports entertainment television special in which 100 competitors attempt to complete an obstacle course.

programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 178
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 178
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: Are You Smarter Than A 5th Grader? 2019 - EP 8
programme.desc: The hit game show where adults have to answer grade-school level questions to win big is back! And this time, the kids play a bigger role as they help contestants prove that they are smarter than a 5th grader. Hosted by John Cena.

programme.title: Whacked Out Sports - EP 26
programme.desc: This series features sports mishaps, crashes and bloopers from all around the world.

programme.title: 72 Cutest Animals - EP 6
programme.desc: Visually stunning and packed with scientific facts, this is a countdown and investigation into the cutest animals in the world. Animal lovers and experts assess each creature and rank them on a sliding scale to eventually uncover the cutest one in the world.

programme.title: Martha Bakes S7 - EP 10
programme.desc: Martha shares her best tips and techniques with viewers, giving them the confidence to create the finest desserts and delectable baked goods in their own kitchens. From Martha's favourite breakfast recipes to puddings and cookies, Martha's updated versions of the classics will set the standard.

programme.title: Tropical Gourmet With Justine Scofield - New Caledonia - EP 5
programme.desc: Star of Australia's most watched cooking series everyday gourmet, Justine Schofield heads to the magical island of new Caledonia to explore its gastronomic wonders, tropical beaches and breathtaking natural beauty. Along the way she will also take time out to cook up a delicious variety of dishes inspired by the local, tropical and French influences that make New Caledonia such a special place.

programme.title: Battle Of The Network Stars - EP 10
programme.desc: This series pits teams of current and classic TV stars from multiple eras and different genres against one another in a variety of athletic games, like Tug of War, Archery, Kayak Relay, Obstacle Course, and Dunk Tank.

programme.title: Zoom, Zim, Zam - EP 11
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday

programme.title: Teddies 2 - EP 41
programme.desc: When a gust of wind takes Sparky's apple pie recipe out the door, she quickly chases after it. As it flies through the garden, her friends chip in to help retrieve it. Later, when Dom is unable to find a missing red ingredient for his 'Spaghetti ala Dom' recipe, Meeks generously offers him the very first tomato he's ever grown.

programme.title: Louie S3 - EP 10
programme.desc: Hey little ones! Do you dreamed of exploring an island or travelling to the moon? Do you want to race cars and horses or to talk to a teddy bear? Or maybe you just want to hide from the rain. No problem! Louie is here! With the help of Yoko, they will draw many exciting things for you to discover!

programme.title: Kongsuni - EP 4
programme.desc: Welcome to Kongsuni's World! She loves ice dream, dancing, playing pretend and other being a big sister! Her friends are Sam the Bird and Eve! No one know Sam can talk so he's super special, playing at Kongsuni's house, in the playground and at school too!

programme.title: My Star Bride - EP 19
programme.desc: R Fang Cao witnesses Li Yin's condition relapsing and how she scolds Shan Shan for not being her biological daughter and attacks her. Fang Cao is in shock and is guilty as she thinks that this is the cause of her persistence in wanting to acknowledge her sister. She decides to let Shan Shan go, not forcing her to return to Vietnam and feels that Shan Shan living a blissful life is enough for her.

programme.title: Morning Express - EP 238
programme.desc: Live A daily brand new News belt, from Monday to Friday, 9am - 9.30am.

programme.title: Recipe Of Life - EP 83
programme.desc: R On Si Yu's and Chao Wei's big day, Yvette uses her father's mobile phone and discovers a video unintentionally. In the video, Ruo Feng tells Min Ming that he is willing to be the father of her child, shocking everyone who is present. Upon knowing that Min Ming is pregnant with his child, Chao Wei dashes out of the door, leaving Si Yu behind.

programme.title: Mr Mrs Kok - EP 10
programme.desc: R "Mr Mrs Kok" is a brand new half-hour dramedy series exploring the explosive and highly entertaining impact of a couple in their 40s going through their mid-life crisis while balancing their passion for crime busting and bad guy beating.

programme.title: The Ecliptic's Mother
programme.desc: The Yue Opera "Huang Daopo" outlines the extraordinary character of a famous female textile innovator in Chinese history. She was born in the last years of the Southern Song Dynasty in Wunijing. She was sold as a child bride at the age of eight and was abused by her mother-in-law in every possible way. After that, she escaped and left his hometown to learn a full set of textile technology in Yazhou, Hainan. Thirty years later, she returned to her hometown and founded a textile workshop.

programme.title: How Are You? - EP 4
programme.desc: R Jia Qiao and Adai feel sad and guilty for the death of the Ah Ma upstairs. Ma Sai finds Gan Dang a good man, and takes him in. The next day, he discovers some money missing and suspects Gan Dang. Qing Qing visits Ming Guang and finds that he has locked himself in. Qing Qing then asks Gan Dang to help her break the lock. Qing Qing wants to pay Gan Dang but he refuses to accept, saying that he would rather Qing Qing owe him a favour...

programme.title: Deals For Joy - EP 42
programme.desc: High quality and fashionable compression socks for everyday use!

programme.title: Deals For Joy - EP 55
programme.desc: The perfect drink to start your day!

programme.title: News 8 at One - EP 238
programme.desc: Weekday afternoon updates on local and world news headlines.

programme.title: Peace Prosperity - EP 66
programme.desc: R Zi Ting looks for Tian Tian to ask about Pierre. She learns that he left a message saying he has gone to Europe. Although she is upset, Zi Ting is very grateful for Tian Tian's help. While consoling her, Tian Tian had the intention of confessing his feelings to her but Megan's sudden appearance interrupts the moment. Zi Ting says that she is willing to wait for Pierre, which upsets Tian Tian.

programme.title: Power 5 - EP 5
programme.desc: R Zi Le's parents coerce Di Ren into becoming their spy and monitor ZI Le's whereabouts in school. Cai Xing and Zi Le fight over an old book and lands into a misunderstanding. Cai Xing uses her superpower of speed and transporting to not only draw on Bao Er's face but also pranks Zi Le. Zi Le urgently needs to go to the toilet and as he gets more and more agitated with his superpower almost emerging, Cai Xing has no idea what trouble she is in for.

programme.title: Hello Singapore's Reading Room - EP 2
programme.desc: R Behind Sharon Au's bubbly public persona is an avid reader who enjoys spending quiet moments with her favourite book. Sharon Au shares her love for reading with news presenter Zhang Haijie, revealing her favourite books and how they shaped her life. Professor Kenneth Dean is the first non-Chinese dean of NUS Department of Chinese. Growing up in Asia, what books inspired the American professor to develop an interest in studying Taoist philosophy?

programme.title: Deals For Joy - EP 17
programme.desc: Incorporate this green diet smoothie into your meals.

programme.title: Deals For Joy - EP 24
programme.desc: Transform your hair effortlessly at home with this hair dye!

programme.title: Golden Age Talentime - EP 22
programme.desc: A popular singing competition which provides the elderly with a platform to showcase their singing talent.

programme.title: Taste Of Life - EP 590
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change.

programme.title: Loving You - EP 20
programme.desc: R An artiste management company offers Dong Sheng a contract with plans to send him overseas for training. Wen Yu is secretly happy since it may mean that Dong Sheng and Lin Li will split. However, Dong Sheng does not want to go overseas. Wen Yu tells Lin Li about the situation, hoping that she will not hinder his future. After some consideration, Lin Li initiates a breakup with Dong Sheng .......

programme.title: Hello Singapore - EP 238
programme.desc: Live Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8.

programme.title: River Hongbao 2021
programme.desc: "River Hongbao 2021" is a collaboration between Mediacorp and SFCCA. This year Lee Wei Song and Lee Si Song specially composed a locally New Year song for the 35th anniversary of River Hongbao. Mediacorp artistes Chen Shu Cheng and Kym Ng will be performing traditional Teochew Opera. Zoe Tay, Romeo Tan, Paige Chua etc will be performing with various local cultural groups to present a spectacular show.

programme.title: Frontline - EP 44
programme.desc: Frontline is a weekly investigative current affairs programme that aims to address issues closest to the hearts of Singaporeans.

programme.title: My Star Bride - EP 20
programme.desc: Fang Cao worries about her mother's hospitalisation and decides to return to Vietnam to take care of her. Shi Jie buys a plane ticket for her leaving in two days. His condition relapses so he is hospitalised, worrying her. She confesses to him in front of his sickbed. Not wanting to burden her, he rejects her and asks her to sign the divorce papers to cut all ties with her. Fang Cao leaves sadly.

programme.title: News Tonight With Highlights From Parliament - EP 27
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news.

programme.title: Secrets Of Xian - EP 1
programme.desc: The documentary "The Secrets of Xian" pursues the historical origin of "freshness" from a new angle and use scientific experiment methods to uncover the secrets behind 'freshness'. The story excavates the cultural connotation behind the food, and tells the audience about the mystery of "fresh" with delicious dishes and new, strange and special stories.

programme.title: The Little Nonya - EP 37
programme.desc: Yueniang is cheated and bought silk of inferior quality. Chen Xi gets his chauffeur Ah Lie pose as a businessman to buy Yueniang's cloth. Yueniang is suspicious of Ah Lie, so she follows him and only to find out that Chen Xi is trying to help her.

programme.title: The Champion - EP 16
programme.desc: R Brace yourself for an ultra-cool cast in a splashing hot drama! Get ready for the perfect storm as a potent mix of love, youth and adrenaline is stirred up in the choppy waters. Will the trials of true friendship and turbulent courtship affect the swim team?

programme.title: Courting Trouble - EP 5
programme.desc: R Ann Kok and Edmund Chen take to the courts and play lawyers handling matrimonial disputes in this 25-parter. The series is a collection of five stories with the court cases inspired by true-life events. Not quite LA Law but romantic sparks do fly between the leads. In a twist of events though, Ann gets married to a workaholic and possessive man Rayson Tan and has a hard time keeping her own marriage from breaking down. Also stars Huang Biren, Liang Weidong and Alvina Wong.

programme.title: The Magnate - EP 21
programme.desc: R Despite humble origins, Song Zhigao rises from watch apprentice to business tycoon. After achieving success, however, he is obsessed by a quest for revenge on those who've done him and his best friend injustice.

programme.desc: A-Li is a very pretty young girl. However she was born visually handicapped and has never known how she looks like, much less her surroundings and the happenings around her. programme.title: True Legend

programme.title: Project Gutenberg

programme.title: Everybody's Business

programme.title: Paint My Love

programme.title: Guia in Love
programme.desc: This series of intertwining love stories captures modern love and the challenges it comes with.

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2011

programme.desc: When an extreme sports enthusiast is mistaken as a triad member, he soon finds himself in Budapest alongside an agent three other individual in a war against terrorism.

programme.desc: As business at his boxing studio begins to falter, Kit Fok, an unbeaten underground fighter, must take on a final match against an intimidating adversary to keep it alive.

programme.desc: As business at his boxing studio begins to falter, Kit Fok, an unbeaten underground fighter, must take on a final match against an intimidating adversary to keep it alive.

programme.title: Pandora's Box
programme.desc: In this Stephen Chow vehicle, a once divine but now human Monkey King needs the titular box to send him back in time.

programme.desc: As business at his boxing studio begins to falter, Kit Fok, an unbeaten underground fighter, must take on a final match against an intimidating adversary to keep it alive.

programme.title: Love Detective

programme.desc: Steve Yuen directs his wife Karena Lam in her second, award-winning collaboration with Jacky Cheung - a tale of human passion divine intervention.

programme.desc: After she stumbles upon her husband's affair with his secretary, a Hong Kong actress embarks on a journey of self-discovery from Shanghai to Guilin.

programme.title: Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: A legendary demon hunter tracks down beasts that enter the human dimension, assisted by a lawman protege and a motley crew of friendly monsters.

programme.title: Hero

programme.desc: Dermot arrives in Swedish Lapland in the depths of winter. First stop is Loggers Lodge, in Harads, is an original timber cabin from 1942.

programme.title: Straight to the Source: Korean Food Ep03
programme.desc: Join Todd and Ricky as they discover Korea's mastery of fermentation, going behind-the-scenes with kimchi and checking out a unique Korean beverage.

programme.title: Late Nite Eats S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Jordan's back in Toronto to check out some new late nite eats. Jordan hits up Poor Romeo, a rock 'n' roll spot in Toronto's East End serving indulgent Tex Mex, drippy burgers, and a whole lot of attitude.

programme.title: The Perfect Serve Ep03
programme.desc: The pressure begins to mount on our three chefs as the AO draws nearer and they need to complete their menus.

programme.title: John Torode's Asia Ep02
programme.desc: John Torode is in the holy city of Amritsar in the Punjab region of northern India. His first outing takes him to the Golden Temple. It provides free meals to as many as 100,000 people per day.

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce Vita S5 Ep11
programme.desc: David visits a distinguished local butcher in Casentino. His award-winning prosciutto is an unbeatable combination of creamy fat and salty meat.

programme.title: Fish of the Day S2 Ep02

programme.title: Angel's Last Mission: Love
